header.p: The SAXPath project is a Simple API for XPath. SAXPath is analogous to SAX in that the API abstracts away the details of parsing and provides a simple event based callback interface.

section.title: Getting Started
section.p: You can download the current $VERSION$ release or a nightly build via the download page.
You could try browsing the FAQ or the online JavaDoc.
Contributors are welcome to join this project. Once you've browsed the FAQ you could try sending an email to one of the mailing lists below or check out the project page.

section.title: Mailing Lists
section.p:
There is a
saxpath-users
email list where you can share ideas and experiences, ask for help, give us feedback or discuss your requirements.
